CustomField.description: We have two quotes: 1) Offer quote - what we want the customer to sign. 2) Auto-Renewal quote - what will be the default pricing if the customer doesn't sign. This field stores a reference to the Offer Quote.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: We have two quotes: 1) Offer quote - what we want the customer to sign. 2) Auto-Renewal quote - what will be the default pricing if the customer doesn't sign. This field stores a reference to the Offer Quote.
CustomField.label: Offer Quote
